description: Isaac (Leander) has tracked his fiance Abe (Gabriel Phoenix) to the hotel where he stayed the night, but Abe takes off as soon as Isaac catches a glimpse of him. Isaac chases Abe into a hedge maze, using the dating app Grid to find where Abe is hiding and to talk him into taking him back. The lovers return home, where they get reacquainted with each other's bodies, and Isaac hungrily devours Abe's ass and cock, unable to get enough, before riding him reverse. Abe makes Isaac's ass his own, making his man cum as he breeds that hole before adorning Isaac's cheeks with his jizz!
title: Off The Grid Part 3: Bareback
